name: Mom! I've got a job!
description:
Finally, I’ve got a job! I will try my best to make all I need! Let’s make world cleaner from rubbish together!

“Mom, I found a job!” Is a platformer game, focused on cleaning and recycling. Help little Neatty clean all the rubbish in three locations avoiding other animals. Game, distinguished by its visual style, music and sound design and gameplay with low entry threshold developed by FoodLovers team. Catchy and fun process of collecting rubbish wouldn’t leave you indifferent.

Worked on the game:
Mortalies
nomersol
AstraBlask
ViWi
bigwowik

Thanks for playing!
